6-year-old boy.context: A 6-year-old boy who underwent tonsillectomy and adenoidectomy two weeks ago.

tonsillectomy.context: A 6-year-old boy who underwent tonsillectomy and adenoidectomy two weeks ago.

adenoidectomy.context: A 6-year-old boy who underwent tonsillectomy and adenoidectomy two weeks ago.

cleaned out his maxillary sinuses.context: Also, I cleaned out his maxillary sinuses.

loud snoring at night.context: Symptoms included loud snoring at night, sinus infections, throat infections, not sleeping well, and fatigue.

sinus infections.context: Symptoms included loud snoring at night, sinus infections, throat infections, not sleeping well, and fatigue.

throat infections.context: Symptoms included loud snoring at night, sinus infections, throat infections, not sleeping well, and fatigue.

not sleeping well.context: Symptoms included loud snoring at night, sinus infections, throat infections, not sleeping well, and fatigue.

fatigue.context: Symptoms included loud snoring at night, sinus infections, throat infections, not sleeping well, and fatigue.

Augmentin.context: He finished up his Augmentin, by a day or two later he was off the Lortab.

Lortab.context: He finished up his Augmentin, by a day or two later he was off the Lortab.

no unusual voice change.context: Mom has not noticed any unusual voice change.

no swallowing difficulty.context: No swallowing difficulty except he does not like the taste of acidic foods such as tomato sauce.

no nasal discharge.context: He has not had any nasal discharge or ever had any bleeding.

no bleeding.context: He has not had any nasal discharge or ever had any bleeding.

breathing better.context: He seems to be breathing better.

pharynx is well healed.context: Exam looks good. The pharynx is well healed.

no discharge or crusting.context: Nasal passages reveal no discharge or crusting.

ibuprofen.context: I told Mom it is okay to use some ibuprofen in case his mouth or jaws are still sensitive.

mouth or jaws are still sensitive.context: I told Mom it is okay to use some ibuprofen in case his mouth or jaws are still sensitive.

hurt if he opens his mouth real wide.context: He says it seems to hurt if he opens his mouth real wide such as when he brushes his teeth.

chronic sinusitis.context: The pathologist described the expected changes of chronic sinusitis and chronic hypertrophic tonsillitis and adenoiditis, and there were no atypical findings on the laboratories.

chronic hypertrophic tonsillitis.context: The pathologist described the expected changes of chronic sinusitis and chronic hypertrophic tonsillitis and adenoiditis, and there were no atypical findings on the laboratories.

adenoiditis.context: The pathologist described the expected changes of chronic sinusitis and chronic hypertrophic tonsillitis and adenoiditis, and there were no atypical findings on the laboratories.

no atypical findings.context: The pathologist described the expected changes of chronic sinusitis and chronic hypertrophic tonsillitis and adenoiditis, and there were no atypical findings on the laboratories.
